selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the area of square C using the areas of squares A and B.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the formula for the Pythagorean theorem to find the area of square C: C = A + B.

selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the calculated area of square C to the correct multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Compare the calculated area of square C with the provided options and return the corresponding option label.
